title: Stress affects survival of adrenal gland stem cells through leptin in Sprague Dawley rats

author: Marta Balog, Faculty of Medicine, Josip Juraj Strossmayer University of Osijek

segmentation: Good morning everyone.
My name is Martha Bob.
I'm coming from Faculty of Medicine, Bostic Department of Medical Biology and Genetics.

This work was performed in laboratory of Neurobiology and today I will give you briefly our drawing and results of our hypothesis that stress is affecting survival of adrenal gland stem cells through leptin inspiratory rates.
I will give you just a short baby ground of adrenal gland involvement in stress so stress is affecting hypothalamus between the regional axis and on the level of adrenal gland.
We can talk about short term stress response when adrenal glands releases epinephrine and norepinephrine norepinephrine.
So when this happens like glycogen breakdown.
To glucose happens with increased blood glucose.
Also, blood pressure, breathing rates, and metabolic rates are increased.

And upon long term stress response, adrenal gland releases mineralocorticoids and glucocorticoids, so mineral mineral green around called corticoids are affecting retention of sodium ions and water by kidneys and also their effecting increased blood volume and blood pressure and glucocorticoids are affecting protein and fats breakdown.
Two locos which is leading to increased glucose levels.
And also local corticoids are suppressing immune system.
Lifting is a hormonal product of OB GYN and it acts through its receptor, so leptin receptor or or BR, it is secreted by adipose tissue.
And it is acting through its receptors in hypothalamus.
So when Leptin is released from fixed issue, it affects hypothalamus and it is supposed to make you not hungry, so it's.
It actually reduces food intake.
And are we River analyzing between a gland becausw OBR is present in adrenal gland and it is affecting it.
Is actually suppressing global corticoid release from adrenal gland upon stress but it is not known if some changes are occurring to this receptor.
Can't stress.
And just a short overview of adrenal gland structure.
Basically we can talk about.
Basic division of adrenal glands to make you wanna import X but it is not so simple.
Cortex is then divided into four different zones.
So upper zone is gomero zone then and inforation undifferentiated or stem cell zone.
Then fascicular and reticular is a man in the middle.
There is medela and on the right photo you can see spatial distribution of these stem cells that we were.

The aim of our study was to assess the changes of leptin receptor expression during stress and spread goalie rights and in this study we hypata size that left and plays an important role in adrenal gland stem cell survival through its receptor.
Appan.
Acute and chronic stress.
In this study, we used spread Dolly rates that were divided in male female, an overlap to my female groups.
We performed over ectomy at the age of 12 weeks and then writes for recovering up to the age of 19 weeks.
At that age, we further divided all of these animals into control or sham.
Acute and chronic stress groups.
We performed acute stress by.
During the cold restraint stress in the metal cubes, you can see this picture at the bottom middle.
Chronic stress was performed in 310 days stress session.
And there was 2 1/2 week.
In between with no no stress, so it was a kind of recovery.
We used different variety of stressors supported by the literature, so we chose the.
The stressors that are affecting all.
Organ systems, so some of them are called restrained for swimming.
We even exposed rates 2 cats order because get is Red's natural enemy.
We are with pre set alarms on mobile phone we.
Left overnight, the lights on with irregular noise and so on.
At the age of seven months, all rates were sacrificed.
An adrenal glands were collected and then we perform the nooner is to chemistry with leptin receptor primary antibody and secondary fits consecrated fluorescent antibody down.
Peoples used to stain nuclei and all images were photographed by confocal microscope and quantified by image software.
So these are our results at the bottom you can see three sets of photos.
On the left you can see the results of Mail groups.
In the middle there is none over victimized group and rights over victimize.
Hope so the blue is for the pee, green is ovr primary antibody and on the right you can see merge photos for each animal group.
Upper photo of presents a quantification of our results.
So we obtained the statistical significance is if we were looking inside anymore groups, each group obtained that statistical significance according to Kruskal voice based.

And according to Tukey test we got significances for male acute stress group and not overly optimized acute stress group and also non non overlap to Miss Control Group, an overly optimized control group.
So if you take a look at this graph you can see that in my own group appan acute stress there is basically no change in electing the receptor expression in stem cells.
But after chronic stress, there is a drop of leptin receptor expression in an overly optimized group there is drop after acute and also after chronic stress and you know very optimized group.
There is a slight change so the elect in respect of expression is a bit higher after acute and chronic stress.
So these are just preliminary results and we have to perform many more experiments to claim.
That's something is really changing, but our conclusion up to now is this.
Lipton might be involved in general stress regulation at the level of adrenal gland, and since leptin regulates glucose uptake and inhibit stressing, you stop those is.
This finding might indicate its important role in stem cell survival and long term effects on stress response by adrenal glands.

So in the future, we plan to prove that sweating is affecting long, long term survival of adrenal gland stem cells and we will try to prove it by labeling rates with the priority and then performing even histochemistry.
Double staining of leptin receptor and Roma uruti.
I'd like to say thank you to my mentalist and my colleagues and thank you for your attention.
